hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "When Allah created the Creation, He wrote in His Book--and He wrote (that) about Himself, and it is placed with Him on the Throne--'Verily My Mercy overcomes My Anger

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى {وَيُحَذِّرُكُمُ اللَّهُ نَفْسَهُ}
